title: Weird im game bug that has been making me restart to fix
body: Randomly from game to game I click enter to chat, and all my clicks in order to move my champion turn red and wont work, and I cant level up my abilities. and the only way that seems to fix it is to restart my pc, anyone have a clue on how to fix this? Also, is this most likely a league client error or a problem with my asus laptop?

replies.body:
That's pretty strange! I believe there may be a background program that could be causing this to happen. I suggest [performing a clean boot of Windows](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure this isn't caused by another program.

Let me know if this caused any change.
